# API Authorization

## Host : https://haraoes-onapp.sku.vn/hara_oes/admin/api

## Signin :

### Request
* Path   : /auth/signin
* Method : POST
* Body   : 
```json
{
	"username" : "giao_hang_nhanh",
	"password" : "GiaoHangNhanh@123"
}
```

### Response
* Success:
  * Status : 200
  * Body :
  ```json
  {
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..dth9kM9ik4by-qPdoO-ETYONx0CsnbWUCkY5aDPHP3g",
    "expire_after": 1547260629 // ms
  }
  ```

* Fail:
  * Status : 401

## Usage :  
Insert token to each request's headers

```js
request : {
  headers : {
    'AccessToken' : "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..dth9kM9ik4by-qPdoO-ETYONx0CsnbWUCkY5aDPHP3g"
  }
}

```
